name: HeartFailure
title: Heart Failure
description: Created for MIPS Registry "Q" clinical quality measure.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Diagnosis of heart failure with current or prior LVEF < 40% prescribed beta-blocker therapy),(Data Element Scope: Condition of heart failure),(Inclusion Criteria: Stable heart failure including Hypertensive heart failure, left ventricular heart failure, congestive heart failure.),(Exclusion Criteria: Right heart failure, biventricular heart failure, High output heart failure, End stage heart failure, Other heart failure)
